meanings.definition: A person who predicts or believes in impending disaster or misfortune.
meanings.sent1: The doomsters warned of a coming storm.
meanings.sent2: The village was filled with doomsters predicting the end of the world.
meanings.sent3: The doomsters at the party kept joking about the snacks running out.
meanings.sent4: Her cat, always a doomsters, seemed to predict when she would come home late.
meanings.sent5: The old man's reputation as a doomsters made him a local legend.
